<h2 class="uppercase">Resources</h2>
<h6 class="lastMod">Last Modified: 24th Feb 2019</h6><h6 class="author">By Naomi Clark</h6>
<br>
<br>


<h4>Here you'll find resources that we've collected to help you on your mindfulness journey.</h4>

<br>

<button class="collapsible">Further Mindfulness Resources</button>
<div class="content col_content">
  <br><p>For more guided audio meditations on different topics, check out the <a href="https://www.uclahealth.org/marc/mindful-meditations">UCLA MARC Free Guided Meditations</a></p>
  <p>If you want more meditations and great videos, take a look at <a href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkB9zEEqnP9kMIf5VChd99Q">Stop, Calm, Think's YouTube channel.</a></p>
  <p><a href="https://www.psychologytoday.com/gb/blog/my-brothers-keeper/201709/be-the-mountain-guided-meditation-video-script">Mountain meditation transcript</a></p>
  
</div>

<button class="collapsible">Mindfulness Apps</button>
<div class="content col_content">
  <br><p>There are many apps to choose from. Here are some of our favourites... Most apps are free to download from your app store and offer a free trial with requirement of later subscription.</p>
<br>
Insight Timer: <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/insight-timer-meditation-app/id337472899?mt=8">iOS</a> | <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.spotlightsix.zentimerlite2&hl=en_GB">Google/Android</a>
<br>
Headspace: <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/headspace-guided-meditation/id493145008?mt=8">iOS</a> | <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.getsomeheadspace.android&hl=en_GB">Google/Android</a>
<br>
Calm: <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/calm/id571800810?mt=8">iOS</a> | <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.calm.android&hl=en_GB">Google/Android</a>
<br>
Buddhify: <a href="https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/buddhify-meditation-on-the-go/id687421118?mt=8">iOS</a> | <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.lvlup.buddhify&hl=en_GB">Google/Android</a>
</div>

<button class="collapsible">Mindfulness Organisations</button>
<div class="content col_content">
  <br>
  [Oxford Mindfulness Centre](http://oxfordmindfulness.org/)
  <br>
  [Mind, the mental health charity, has an information page on mindfulness](https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/drugs-and-treatments/mindfulness/#.W-1FaJP7Tow)
  <br>
  [Mental Health Foundation's 'Be Mindful' programme](https://bemindful.co.uk/)
  <br>
  <a href="https://www.destressmonday.org/">De-Stress Monday</a> | learn how to start the week with a mindful approach
</div>

<button class="collapsible">Recommended Reading</button>
<div class="content col_content">
  <br><p>A general good place to start is with any introductory or beginners book. This may seem obvious but it's good to remind ourselves that we won't become advanced overnight!<br><br>For a good introduction - **"Mindfulness: A practical guide to finding peace in a frantic world"** by Prof. Mark Williams and Dr. Danny Penman.<br><br>For integrating mindfulness into daily life - **"This is happening"** by Rohan Gunatillake.<br><br>Wanting an overview of the science? Check out **"The Science of Meditation"** by Daniel Goleman and Richard Davidson.
</div>
<button class="collapsible">Read Cited Articles</button>

var coll = document.getElementsByClassName("collapsible");
var i;

for (i = 0; i < coll.length; i++) {
  coll[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
    this.classList.toggle("active");
    var content = this.nextElementSibling;
    if (content.style.display === "block") {
      content.style.display = "none";
    } else {
      content.style.display = "block";
    }
  });
}
</script>
